summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4611 for the improvement of the alley in Block 19, Laurelhurst Heights Addition, as condemned by Ordinance No. 46859, from 51st Avenue Northeast to a point 25 feet southwest of the southwest line of Lot 15 of said block; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 53670, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
